name: tm50
effect: Teaches Overheat to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Overheat to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Nightmare Gen I: Substitute)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Enables full-power attack, but sharply lowers SP. ATK.
flavor_text.emerald: Enables full-power attack, but sharply lowers SP. ATK.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An intense attack that also sharply reduces the user’s SP. ATK stat.
